description: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) is smallest unused number such that a(n) is coprime to a(n-1), sopfr(a(n)) is coprime to sopfr(a(n-1)), Omega(a(n)) does not equal Omega(a(n-1)), the string length of a(n) does not equal the string length of a(n-1), and a(n) has no digit in common with a(n-1), where sopfr(k) is the sum of the primes dividing k, with repetition.
